title: Rami Malek's retelling of his impromptu kiss with Daniel Craig will make your day
text:
Cape Town – Rami Malek, who is playing the villain in the latest James Bond film, No Time To Die, revealed that after a particularly challenging scene, he and Daniel Craig shared a kiss.

Speaking on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert the Bohemian Rhapsody actor said while he can't reveal much about the upcoming film, a memorable moment was when he and Daniel had to shoot a challenging scene together.

When they eventually got through it, Rami recalled, "He grabbed me, picked me up, and I can't tell you who initiated the next moment, if it was him or I, but, a kiss transpired between the two of us, and I'm going to say that Daniel initiated it."

Asked if it was welcomed he said, "Yes, very much so," before continuing, "I took a moment, caught my breath, and I looked out and said, 'So does this make me a bond girl?'"

The audience erupted in laughter.

description: Rami Malek has revealed he and Daniel Craig had a little kiss to celebrate the end of a challenging scene in 'No Time To Die'.
